name: Paradise Mayday DEMO
description:
A very VERY short demo as my entry to Trans Rep Game Jam!

Q&A:

"Where's the trans rep?"

  • It'll be incredibly more obvious when Chapter 1 is completed, but several characters are transgender! There's one character who has hints about it in the demo.

What kind of game is this? 

  • Not much of a game currently, but in the future it will start off as a murder-mystery.

What improvements to this Demo can I expect in the final release?

  • A lot! I'll be adding music, working on a custom GUI, adding more sprites and CGs--and finishing up the rest of the chapter!

Who's the creator?

  • Hi, I'm decomakke and I fought for my life to submit this demo within the deadline!
